Okay, here's a description of the image in natural English:

The photo shows a sprawling cityscape bathed in the warm glow of a sunset. The sky is a gradient of colors – a pale blue gradually transitioning into a rich orange and yellow near the horizon.  The city itself is dense with skyscrapers and buildings stretching out as far as the eye can see. 

A major road cuts diagonally through the center of the frame, with several lanes of traffic illuminated by the streetlights. There are buildings and smaller structures scattered throughout the cityscape, and in the distance, you can see the silhouettes of more buildings. 

The overall impression is one of a busy, modern metropolis at dusk, with the beautiful colors of the sunset adding to the scene’s drama.
